ISSUE.TITLE: Support batch suggest in SVC backend
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: PR #663 is going to bring support for batch suggest operations. The SVC backend could benefit from implementing _suggest_batch instead of _suggest. It could process a batch of texts with parallel and/or vector operations.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #669 from NatLibFi/issue663-suggest-batch-omikuji Batch suggest in Omikuji backend

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Implement batched suggest in SVC backend. Fixes #667
Implement batched suggest in SVC backend. Fixes #667
